Once the symbol of Namco games during the heyday of the arcade, now the long sought-after yellow flag can be yours! We captured its original unmistakable pixel-style and placed it atop a colorful cap for a head-turning look! It’ll be sure to boost your popularity just as well as it boosts scores![#Legal]
